roleset.name: equip with weapon/armor

example.name: soldier
example.text: Those close to Miller believe he was shot by an armored Israeli personnel carrier.

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary-1 was armored *trace*-1 by her servants in gold chainmail in perparation for her match agains the Black Knight.
example.arg: in perparation for her match agains the Black Knight

roleset.note: Based on dictionary.com. Frame by Perryn. Member of Vncls equip-13.4.2-1-1.
